clothes.title: DRAPED DRESS WITH SATIN FINISH
clothes.description: MATERIALS, CARE AND ORIGIN MATERIALS We work with monitoring programmes to ensure compliance with safety, health and quality standards for our products.   The Green to Wear 2.0 standard aims to minimise the environmental impact of textile manufacturing. To that end, we have developed Inditex’s The List programme, which helps guarantee both that production processes are clean and that our garments are safe and healthy.
